## Sparse Matrix

```{r}
library(Matrix)
N <- 6
set.seed(123)
sparse_mat <- sparseMatrix(
  i = sample(N, N, replace = F),
  j = sample(N, N, replace = F),
  x = runif(N),
  dims = c(N, N)
)
sparse_mat
sparse_mat_py <- r_to_py(sparse_mat)
```

```{python}
r.sparse_mat_py
```

```{r}
py_to_r(sparse_mat_py)
```
